name: Dynamic Menu Product Categories
author: Pal Code

sections.description: “Dynamic Menu Product Categories” is a plugin designed to enhance user experience on WooCommerce sites by automatically adding product categories to specific menus. This plugin allows stores to dynamically display product categories, making it easier for customers to navigate and find the products they’re looking for quickly and efficiently.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/dynamic-menu-product-categories directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Go to ‘Settings’ > ‘Dynamic Menu Product Categories’ to configure.
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do?

This plugin automatically adds WooCommerce product categories to your selected navigation menus, enhancing user navigation and improving the shopping experience.

How do I configure the plugin?

After activating the plugin, navigate to ‘Settings’ > ‘Dynamic Menu Product Categories’ and select the menus where you want the product categories to appear. Save your changes to apply the settings.

short_description: Short Description: A plugin that dynamically adds WooCommerce product categories to your selected menus.
